programme.title: Love Suddenly
programme.desc: Still hung up on his teenage sweetheart Marie, Jakob sets out to win her back. However, she is under the mistaken impression that he is more successful than he actually is. Soon, Jakob finds himself in a web of lies he cannot escape from.

programme.title: Exit
programme.desc: Thomas has it all: family and career at its best. But when his company’s most lucrative deal ever is about to close, something goes terribly wrong. He is arrested for the murder of his business partner when his fingerprint is found on the murder weapon.

programme.title: The Deep
programme.desc: March 1984, a few miles off the south coast of Iceland, a fishing boat sank with all its men. One of the crew members miraculously survived. After six hours in the ocean, the exhausted man is washed ashore, only to find himself on a deadly lava field.

programme.title: Esteban
programme.desc: In Cuba, while helping his single mother sell black market beauty products, a 9-year-old boy dreams of becoming a pianist.

programme.title: Easy Living
programme.desc: A 14-year-old kid, a young woman who smuggles medicines up and down the Italian border with France and a bizarre American tennis teacher who dreams of being a painter. Their lives take a turn when they meet an illegal migrant.

programme.title: Domingo (2021)
programme.desc: After his divorce, 55-year-old Domingo embarks on a belated journey to fulfil his lifelong dream – to become a sports commentator. Though he aspires to join the local TV station, his commentaries are unknowingly leaving an impact on his community.

programme.title: Young Tiger
programme.desc: Illegally smuggled into France to work, 15-year-old Many is unexpectedly placed in school and a foster home. Years later, thriving in the French Sikh community, Many faces a moral dilemma arising from his ties to his family in his home country.

programme.title: Lucky Girl
programme.desc: TV star Nina Sokil is diagnosed with bone cancer, but deeming her career to be more important with her health, Nina goes to absurd lengths to hide her condition so that she keeps working.

programme.title: Lost Transport
programme.desc: Spring 1945. A train deporting hundreds of Jewish prisoners gets stranded near a small German village occupied by the Red Army. A chance encounter between German girl Winnie, Dutch Jew Simone and Russian Vera leads to an unexpected friendship.

programme.title: Behind the Mountains
programme.desc: After spending four years in jail for vandalizing his place of work, Rafik has only one plan, take his son to the mountains and show him his amazing discovery.

programme.title: Aurora (2019)
programme.desc: Aurora, a commitment-phobic party animal, meets Iranian Darian one night at a hot-dog stand in Lapland. Darian is running from death and Aurora is running from love. They need each other to finally stop running.

programme.title: Love Suddenly
programme.desc: Still hung up on his teenage sweetheart Marie, Jakob sets out to win her back. However, she is under the mistaken impression that he is more successful than he actually is. Soon, Jakob finds himself in a web of lies he cannot escape from.

programme.title: Pari
programme.desc: Pari, an Iranian mother, goes to Athens with her husband to meet their son studying abroad. When their son is nowhere to be seen, she embarks on a journey in the unfamiliar city where she will uncover more than just her son’s whereabouts.

programme.title: A Murder Of Crows The Detective And The Fear
programme.desc: When Inspector Martin Brühl awakens in the morning, he is alarmed by partner Susanne Koch’s absence. Unbeknownst to him, Susanne witnessed a crime on her nightly walk home. Critically injured in an ATM explosion, she was kidnapped by the perpetrators.

programme.title: The Human Part
programme.desc: While telling his parents and two sisters that he is a successful CEO of a large IT company, Pekka is actually bankrupt and penniless. He cons strangers for money and food. What happens when his parents show up for a surprise visit?
